text: I feel like it’s also important to note that a lot of student workers, if they were still on payroll and worked for UCI, are in fact getting paid leave and even though we aren’t getting our full hours, that money still has to come from somewhere :(

The fresh hub has been defunded by the regents for the past two years. ASUCI legislation has allowed it to live on to the 2019-2020 school year through passing legislation. The legislation for the 2020-2021 school year that is being proposed seeks to defund it and give that money to construction projects if I’m not mistaken.
